# Toolbox

An essential plugin for Hytale. It provides a set of useful commands and features to expand your capabilities.

## Command

| Command                                                            | Permission                          | Description                                                  |
|--------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------|
| `/announce "<message>"`                                            | gufli.toolbox.command.announce      | Broadcast a message to all players                           |
| `/directmessage <player> "<message>"` | gufli.toolbox.command.directmessage | Send a private message to another player                     |
| `/back`                                                            | gufli.toolbox.command.back          | Teleports you to your location prior to a death,teleport,... |
